title: How does the lack of freedom portray in Noli Me Tangere? - Quora

response.answer_text: It doesn't because your teachers were lying. Noli Me Tangere exposes obsolete and medieval judiciary practices by the church and not lack of freedom or the indio slavery your teachers invent in teaching history. In fact, I know a quoran who teaches history as a history teacher and spread lies all over quora. Read the noli me tangere again. The victims were as follows: Don Rafael Ibarra. Died in prison, arrested without due process and based on “tsismis" rather than substantial evidence.Don Crisostomo Ibarra. Necame a figitive without due process and again based on “tsismis" instead of substantial evidenceSisa. Arrested without due process. Martyr to an iresponsible indio husband.Crispin. Maltreated by a friar, taken as a servant as payment for debtMaria Clara. Raped by a priest then killed her selfThe villains. Padre Damaso. Dominican who has no qualm killing another human being kn the shallow basis of insultPadre Salvi. HornyAlferez. Uneducated and unqualified but managed to get a high government positionVictorina.
